TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MetadataExporter extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Exports service description information into metadata.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Metadata export is the process of describing service endpoints and projecting them into a parallel, standardized representation (typically, but not necessarily XML) that applications can access to implement a client that uses the service. To export metadata from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=fullName> objects, use an implementation of the MetadataExporter abstract class. A MetadataExporter implementation generates metadata that is encapsulated in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet?displayProperty=fullName> instance.
The MetadataExporter class provides a framework for generating policy expressions that describe the capabilities and requirements of an endpoint binding and its associated operations, messages and faults. These policy expressions are captured in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext?displayProperty=fullName> instance. A MetadataExporter implementation can then attach these policy expressions to the metadata it generates.
The MetadataExporter calls into each <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement?displayProperty=fullName> that implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> interface in the binding of a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> when generating a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> object for the MetadataExporter implementation to use. You can export new policy assertions by implementing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension> interface on your custom implementations of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement?displayProperty=fullName> type.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter?displayProperty=fullName> type is the implementation of the MetadataExporter class included with [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> type generates WSDL metadata with attached policy expressions.
To export custom WSDL metadata or WSDL extensions for endpoint behaviors, contract behaviors or binding elements in a service endpoint, you can implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> interface. The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> type calls into parts of a service endpoint that implement this interface when generating the WSDL document from that endpoint.
## Examples The following code example is an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method that demonstrates how the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.State%2A> property of the class <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> is used to attach a custom <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter?displayProperty=fullName> that modifies the export of data contracts in the endpoint.
[!code-cs[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#6](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/c_customwsdlextensions.client/wsdldocumentationattribute.cs#6)] [!code-cs[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/c_customwsdlextensions.client/wsdldocumentationattribute.cs#5)]

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of errors that occurred during metadata export.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is populated with errors that occurred during the metadata export process. Users of derived classes should check the Errors property prior to using the exported metadata.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ExportContract(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription contract) cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, exports a contract description into metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Override and implement ExportContract to convert a contract description into metadata.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ExportEndpoint(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint) cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, converts an endpoint into metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Override and implement ExportEndpoint to convert a contract description into metadata.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig instance class System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext ExportPolicy(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint) cil managed

Docs.param: The endpoint from which to extract policy assertions.
Docs.summary: Converts policy assertions into a object.
Docs.returns: An object that contains policy assertion information for the endpoint. The policy assertions can then be embedded in a metadata document.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet GetGeneratedMetadata() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns the metadata generated by a call to either <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.ExportPolicy%2A>.
Docs.returns: An enumerable collection of objects that contain the exported metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the GetGeneratedMetadata method to retrieve the metadata generated from earlier calls. Check the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> property prior to retrieving the metadata to ensure that you have the metadata you want.

Docs.summary: Specifies the version of WS-Policy specification being used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyVersion> class contains the namespace for the version of WS-Policy the metadata exporter uses. WS-Policy 1.2 and 1.5 are currently supported.

Docs.summary: Gets a dictionary of objects used in the export of metadata.
Docs.value: A dictionary of objects used by the importer to export contracts and endpoints.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the `State` property to pass a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> state data required to successfully export endpoints or contracts.
## Examples The following code example is an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method that demonstrates how the State property of the derived class <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> is used to attach a custom <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter?displayProperty=fullName> that modifies the export of data contracts in the endpoint.
[!code-cs[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#6](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/c_customwsdlextensions.client/wsdldocumentationattribute.cs#6)] [!code-cs[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/c_customwsdlextensions.client/wsdldocumentationattribute.cs#5)]
